_meta.title: WF-00: Scene Background Generator
_meta.description: Generate empty interior scenes for the preset library. Run this to create base backgrounds for product compositing.
_meta.author: Amoeba AI Studio

_meta.title: Scene Size (4:3 landscape - adjust for 16:9 if needed)

inputs.text: empty modern office interior, no furniture, natural daylight streaming through large floor-to-ceiling windows, scandinavian design, white walls, light wooden flooring, clean minimalist space, architectural photography, high-end commercial real estate photography, soft natural shadows, 8k ultra detailed, professional interior photography

_meta.title: Positive Prompt (EDIT for each scene type)

inputs.text: furniture, chairs, desks, tables, people, text, watermark, low quality, blurry, distorted, cartoon, illustration, cluttered, messy, objects on floor, decorations, plants, artwork, busy, crowded

_meta.title: Save Scene (rename prefix for each type)

inputs.text:
SCENE PROMPTS - Copy these to the positive prompt:

=== MODERN OFFICE ===
empty modern office interior, no furniture, natural daylight streaming through large floor-to-ceiling windows, scandinavian design, white walls, light wooden flooring, clean minimalist space, architectural photography

=== MEETING ROOM ===
empty modern conference room, no furniture, glass walls, professional corporate interior, neutral colors, even diffused lighting, contemporary design, architectural real estate photography

=== CREATIVE STUDIO ===
empty creative studio space, no furniture, exposed brick walls, industrial loft, large windows, mixed materials, concrete floor, plants on windowsill, artistic atmosphere, design agency interior

=== MINIMAL SHOWROOM ===
empty white gallery space, no furniture, museum-quality lighting, pure white walls and floor, subtle shadows, high-end showroom, luxury retail interior, clean architectural

=== EXECUTIVE SUITE ===
empty executive office, no furniture, dark wood paneling, warm directional lighting, city view through windows, prestigious corporate interior, corner office, premium materials

=== HOME OFFICE ===
empty home office room, no furniture, residential interior, warm natural light, white walls, wooden flooring, cozy atmosphere, work from home space, scandinavian home

=== LOUNGE CORNER ===
empty office lounge area, no furniture, relaxed atmosphere, soft lighting, modern breakout space, comfortable informal interior, collaborative workspace area
